app_metadata.description: Eclipse Mosquitto is an open source MQTT broker

run_as_context.description: Mosquitto runs as any non-root user.

app_metadata.title: Eclipse Mosquitto

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Eclipse Mosquitto

attrs.label: Enable Persistence
attrs.description: If enabled, connection, subscription and message data will be written to the disk in mosquitto.db

attrs.label: Autosave Interval
attrs.description:
The number of seconds that mosquitto will wait between each time it saves the in-memory database to disk. </br>
If set to 0, the in-memory database will only be saved when mosquitto exits or when receiving the SIGUSR1 signal. </br
Note that this setting only has an effect if persistence is enabled.

attrs.label: Allow Anonymous
attrs.description: Boolean value that determines whether clients that connect without providing a username are allowed to connect.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Eclipse Mosquitto.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Actual Budget files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Actual Budget files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Broker Port
attrs.description: The port for Eclipse Mosquitto Broker

attrs.label: Enable Websockets
attrs.description: Enable Websockets for Eclipse Mosquitto.

attrs.label: Web Sockets Port
attrs.description: The port for Eclipse Mosquitto Web Sockets

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
